title: Mobile-Based Distance Education Course Design Using the ADDIE Model

context.prior_knowledge: Basic educational technology skills and experience in social studies education
context.additional_context: Requirement for smartphone-optimized content design considering environments without PC access. Practice-oriented design immediately applicable for pre-service/in-service teachers

learning_goals: Design educational programs by applying ADDIE model’s five phases (Analysis-Design-Development-Implementation-Evaluation) to mobile environments
Propose ≥3 content development strategies suitable for smartphone-based microlearning
Utilize ≥2 types of formative assessment tools executable in resource-constrained technological environments

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
